analysis.description:
OMPxContract.buyBack (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#431-446) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(totalPrice) (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#446)

Reentrancy in OMPxContract.getFee (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#340-347):
	External calls:
	- feeReceiverContract.receiveFunds.value(feeBalance).gas(150000)() (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#342-346)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- feeBalance (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#346)

BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#240) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#242-244)

OMPxContract.getBuyBackPrice (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#356-366) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- address(this).balance == 0

Reentrancy in OMPxContract.purchaseSafe (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#387-429):
	External calls:
	- currentPrice = getPurchasePrice(msg.value,tokensToPurchase) (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#390-391)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- feeBalance (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#403-405)

OMPxContract.OMPxContract (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#318-327) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(owner,token.initialSupply()) (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#326-327)

OMPxContract.purchaseSafe (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#387-429) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(this,tokensToMint) (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#410)

Reentrancy in OMPxContract.buyBack (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#431-446):
	External calls:
	- currentPrice = getBuyBackPrice(0) (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#432-433)
	- require(bool)(tokensToBuyBack <= token.balanceOf(msg.sender)) (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#439-440)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stat_ethReceived (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#445-446)
	- stat_timesBoughtBack (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#445-446)
	- stat_tokensBoughtBack (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#445-446)

Reentrancy in OMPxContract.getFee (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#340-347):
	External calls:
	- feeReceiverContract.receiveFunds.value(feeBalance).gas(150000)() (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#342-346)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- feeSent (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#346)

Reentrancy in OMPxContract.purchaseSafe (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#387-429):
	External calls:
	- currentPrice = getPurchasePrice(msg.value,tokensToPurchase) (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#390-391)
	- availableTokens = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#406-407)
	- token.mint(this,tokensToMint) (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#410)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(oddEthers) (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#423)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- oddSent (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#424)
	- stat_ethSent (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#426-427)
	- stat_timesPurchased (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#426-427)
	- stat_tokensPurchased (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#426-427)

Reentrancy in OMPxContract.spend (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#446-449):
	External calls:
	- token.burn(tokensToSpend) (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#448)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- stat_timesSpend (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#448-449)
	- stat_tokensSpend (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#448-449)

Discountable.defaultCoef should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#103)
Discountable.descPrecision should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#103)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_amount' of Discountable.addDiscount (/unique_contracts/0x09a80172ed7335660327cd664876b5df6fe06108.sol#105-107) is not in mixedCase
